Header.heading: Verify credentials
Header.description: Effortlessly verify credentials with Inji Verify! Just scan the QR code or upload it for instant validation, following the steps below.

QrCodePrompt.label: Scan QR Code
QrCodePrompt.description: Tap 'Scan' to start scanning the document or card with a QR code

ActivateCamera.label: Activate Camera and Position QR Code
ActivateCamera.description: Activate your device camera and hold the QR code within the frame to initiate verification.

Verifying.label: Verification in Progress
Verifying.description: The QR code verification is in progress.

QrCodePrompt.label: Upload QR Code
QrCodePrompt.description: Upload a file that contains a QR code

Verifying.label: Verify document
Verifying.description: Verification for the document or card is in progress.
